name: For the Birds [TRIJAM 93]
description:
This game and all of its assets were made collaboratively in Game Maker Studio in a period of about three hours (12:51 PM to 3:50 PM) for TRIJAM 93. The theme was "unachievable".

For years, birds have ruled over the skies, taunting humans and pooping on their statues. But today, you have done what was thought to have been impossible: achieved flight! Use your trusty boomstick to stay airborne and show those feathery fiends what for!

If you want the music from this project, go here: https://jonrmohr.bandcamp.com/album/4-the-birds-original-soundtrack

*CREDITS*

Jackson Armstrong: Art

Jon Mohr: Music

Brian Pokorny: Code and SFX

Fun fact: We completed this game one minute under the limit (3:00), and the game has exactly 299 lines of code (1 under 300). Just thought that was a fun coincidence.
